title: ISimulationForceFeatureData.ExternalState
description: Gets or sets whether your application can listen to force-related motion study events.
returns: True to listen to IMotionStudy ForceTimeStepChangeNotify and ForceOutputTimeStampChangeNotify events, false to not
remarks: When a force is set to external, IMotionStudy ForceTimeStepChangeNotify and ForceOutputTimeStampChangeNotify events are called with the motor name, time, and a pointer for the return value. These events are called at every major time step from ADAMS. You can implement any force law after catching these events. The return value for each event is a double that specifies the new force or torque magnitude.
